TopicTitle: There any "planet mods" out there that will work with OPM?

Articles.Content: I.E. is there anything that will add more things to land on, but still keep the OPM things?
Yes, I believe Trans-Keptunian Objects does just that.
Other_Worlds is a star system mod that is compatible With OPM

According to the OPM release thread Kerbol plus and trans-keptunian as mentionned by legoclone09.

And according to my current career it's compatible with Arkas and Asclepius too.
